alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:25PM CDT until August 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BLOUNT AND NORTHWESTERN SEVIER COUNTIES... At 424 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from New Market to 11 miles southwest of Pigeon Forge, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, McMahan, and Wears Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
